forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening then fog developing overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
